 About Us

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ custom_padding=”64px||25px||false|false”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”27px|0px|0|0px|false|false”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” header_font=”Oswald|on||on|” header_text_align=”left” header_font_size=”60px” header_line_height=”1.3em” max_width=”450px” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”]

Custom Travel Experiences

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ed4441″ divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”on|on|off%22″ _builder_version=”3.2″ max_width=”150px” height=”false” custom_margin=”30px|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.9em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” max_width=”450px” min_height=”330px” custom_margin=”60|||” custom_padding=”||60px|” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_delay=”400ms” animation_intensity_slide=”4%” locked=”off”]

Discover Destinations became a reality when the passion to travel was met with an opportunity. With over 15 years of combined experience in travel, a business was formed with one goal in mind “To Leave No Stone Unturned” for our customers. There is no destination that is undiscoverable with our commitment to service and attention to detail. Our company is one of the few niche service providers to budget, semi-luxury, luxury and corporate travelers. Turn your dreams into discoveries one destination at a time.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://discover-destinations.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/06/travel-binoculars.jpg” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ custom_margin=”|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”%22fade_in%22″ animation_duration=”500ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” animation=”fade_in”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ parallax=”on” custom_padding=”19px||35px||false|false”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”27px|0px|0|0px|false|false” locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” header_font=”Oswald|on||on|” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”60px” header_line_height=”1.3em” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”]

Building Memories

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ed4441″ divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”on|on|off%22″ _builder_version=”3.2″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” height=”false” custom_margin=”30px|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text admin_label=”Sub Title” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” text_line_height=”1.4em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” text_orientation=”center” max_width=”800px” custom_margin=”|139px||138px||” custom_padding=”30px|||0px||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_delay=”200ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”]

Discover Destinations proudly caters to the unique needs of each and every individual. Our custom and fixed itineraries are great for all clients such as students, corporations, and leisure travelers of all ages. We pride ourselves on the customer service we provide to you and your clients, your customers will be treated like our own. Our main goal is to have a 100% satisfied customer.

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Look Inside Section” _builder_version=”3.22″ background_image=”https://discover-destinations.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/06/travel-landscape-17.jpg” parallax=”on” custom_padding=”0px||0px|”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ make_equal=”on” module_class=” et_pb_row_fullwidth” _builder_version=”3.25″ width=”100%” width_tablet=”100%” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” max_width=”100%” max_width_tablet=”100%” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding=”0px||0px|” make_fullwidth=”on”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#ffffff” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(255,255,255,0.85)” background_color_gradient_end_position=”50%” parallax=”on” custom_padding=”8%|6%|6%|6%” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Look Inside Title” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” header_font=”Oswald|on||on|” header_text_align=”right” header_font_size=”60px” header_line_height=”1.3em” max_width=”450px” module_alignment=”right” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”]

No Distance Is too Far

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”3.23″ animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left” animation_duration=”500ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_divider color=”#ed4441″ divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”on|on|off%22″ _builder_version=”3.2″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”right” height=”false” custom_margin=”30px|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text admin_label=”Look Inside Sub Title” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” text_line_height=”1.4em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” text_orientation=”right” max_width=”450px” module_alignment=”right” custom_padding=”30px|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_delay=”200ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”]With over 15 years of travel experience Discover Destinations provides the most competitive pricing with the highest quality product in the industry. We pass our wholesale rates on to our clients with a guarantee of 24 hour response time.

Customers

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”CTA Section Subtitle” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Roboto|on||on|” text_font_size=”24px” text_letter_spacing=”4px” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” animation_style=”zoom” animation_intensity_zoom=”20%”]

MICE, Luxury Groups, Student Groups, Church Groups, Corporate Travel, Conferences, Incentive, FIT, Leisure Travel,Honeymoon, Adventure and more.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ffffff” divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”on|on|off%22″ _builder_version=”3.2″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” height=”false” animation_style=”zoom” animation_delay=”200ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”20%” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”24px” text_line_height=”1.4em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” max_width=”750px” custom_padding=”30px||40px|” animation_style=”zoom” animation_delay=”300ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”20%”]

You can send your clients to travel with the peace of mind knowing that your itinerary was planned and is being executed by one of our highly trained and traveled consultants. We also provide a trained and experienced escort to ensure that your trip goes as smooth as possible. All of our guides are licensed, knowledgeable and experienced to answer any questions that you may have.

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”CTA” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ background_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.7)” background_image=”https://discover-destinations.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/zcyifpt0e_e.jpg” background_blend=”overlay” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”101px||0px||false|false”][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” module_class=” et_pb_row_fullwidth” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” width=”100%” width_tablet=”100%” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” max_width=”100%” max_width_tablet=”100%” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” min_height=”89px” custom_margin=”-8px||||false|false” custom_padding=”0|0px|22px|0px|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px|||” custom_padding_phone=”” make_fullwidth=”on”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”CTA Section Title” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ text_font=”||||” text_line_height=”1em” header_font=”Oswald|on||on|” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”60px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”-56px||30px||false|false” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”]
